name: KLR Communications
tag_list: pr, public-relations, consumer-electronics, autiomotive, life-style, technology, graphic-design, event-planning, event-management, social-media, twitter, facebook, consulting, branding, seo, communications
overview: KLR Communications is a boutique PR agency located in southern California. KLR works with leading and emerging brands across multiple industries including automotive, consumer, lifestyle, real estate, technology and telecom. In addition to media and analyst relations, KLR specializes in social media, Marcom strategy and creative services. KLR Communications has a strong reputation for securing top-tier media opportunities and its strong relationships with key industry influencers and analysts. KLR develops strategies that put its clients in the middle of the conversation and executes effective campaigns for interaction and engagement with customers, partners, employees and stakeholders.
